# (Deprecated) Early Science Packs:

**NOTE:** some older blueprints do not have markers of input/output, instead they have description of what has to go onto the belts.

## Red:
Input 1: copper ore / coal,
Input 2: iron ore / coal,
Input 3: iron ore / coal,
Output: 1 red bottle per second.

![Early Red Science Blueprint](images/deprecated/EarlyRedScience.png)
```

```

## Green:
Input 1: iron ore / coal,
Input 2: copper ore / coal,
Input 3: iron ore / coal.
![Early Green Science Blueprint](images/deprecated/EarlyGreenScience.png)

```

```

## Early Black Science:

Input 1: stone / coal,
Input 2: iron ore / coal,
Input 3: iron ore / coal,
Input 4: copper ore / coal.

![Early Black Science Blueprint](images/deprecated/EarlyBlackScience.png)

```

```

## Blue:
Input 1: sulfur,
Input 2: plastic,
Input 3: copper plates,
Input 4: iron plates,
Input 5: steel plates.

![Early Blue Science Blueprint](images/deprecated/EarlyBlueScience.png)
```

```
